ygData.subject: Question about a few quest items
ygData.msgSnippet: I have bones from the necromancer near the little dock in tox forest. Someone gave me a wisp stone.  Is this even a quest item? Also I found some sort of gnoll
ygData.messageBody:
I have bones from the necromancer near the little dock in tox forest.
Someone gave me a wisp stone. Is this even a quest item?
Also I found some sort of gnoll fur in blackburrow which I can't sell.

Does anyone know anything about these items?

Azboklin the enchanter
